The final concentration of Rho-BSA was 100 nM and of polymers ranged from 32-0.5 μM.
Kd was determined using the non-linear curve fitting module of Origin 8.5 and equation 2.
where y is the fractional saturation plot obtained with equation 1, P is the polymer concentration (x-axis) and c is the constant Rho-BSA concentration (100 nM).
